# Betterment for Advisors

## Overview
- **Website:** https://www.betterment.com/advisors
- **Category:** Robo-Advisor Platform & Tech-Enabled Custodian
- **Description:** Betterment Advisor Solutions is a tech-enabled custodian built for independent RIAs and investment advisors. It provides portfolio management, tax optimization, billing, and client management tools in a single platform.
- **Status:** Active
- **Last Updated:** 2026-02-12

## Pricing Tiers

### Betterment for Advisors Pricing Structure

| Tier | Price (Annual) | Price (Monthly) | User Limit | Key Features |
|------|----------------|-----------------|------------|--------------|
| Fixed Fee | $150 per funded advisor per month | $150/minimum/month | Unlimited advisors | Fixed monthly advisor fee |
| Tiered Wrap Fee | Varies by AUM tier | Included in AUM fee | Unlimited clients | Asset-based wrap fee |
| **Asset Range** | **Wrap Fee (bps)** | | | |
| $0-$2MM | 20bps | | | |
| $2-$10MM | 18bps | | | |
| $10-$30MM | 16bps | | | |
| $30-$100MM | 14bps | | | |
| $100MM+ | 12bps | | | |

### Notes on Pricing
- **Annual billing discount:** Not applicable - monthly billing only
- **Free trial details:** No free trial; requires advisor signup and agreement
- **Minimum commitments:** No minimum balance requirement for advisors
- **Contact information for enterprise pricing:** Contact sales at Betterment Advisor Solutions
- **User limit restrictions by tier:** Unlimited funded advisors and clients per firm
- **Fee calculation methodology:** Fees accrued daily, calculated based on daily balance, charged monthly
- **Fee realization:** Fees realized by selling portion of client holdings on last business day of month/quarter
- **ACH transfer timing:** Advisory fee payment sent to firm 2-4 weeks after month/quarter end

## Key Features

### Core Capabilities (All Plans)
- **Portfolio Management:** Automated portfolio management with tax-loss harvesting, direct indexing, and model marketplaces
- **Client Onboarding:** Paperless account opening with agreement automation and pre-populated forms
- **Billing & Fee Management:** Flexible billing options (AUM-based, flat fee, tiered structure)
- **Tax Optimization:** Tax-loss harvesting, tax-smart transitions, tax-coordinated rebalancing
- **Cash Management:** High-yield cash reserve integration (3.25% APY)
- **Client Portal:** Branded client portal with intuitive interface
- **Advisor Dashboard:** Comprehensive dashboard with client overview, activity tracking, and reporting

### Advanced Features (Higher Tiers)
- **Model Marketplace:** Access to expert-built portfolios from in-house team and third parties
- **Advanced Tax Strategies:** Tax-smart transitions, tax-coordinated rebalancing
- **Custom Portfolio Options:** Flexible portfolio construction tools
- **Dedicated Support:** Access to specialist support team
- **API Access:** Integration capabilities via partnership agreement

### Enterprise-Only Features
- **Custom Portfolio Design:** Tailored portfolio construction for specific client needs
- **White-Label Solutions:** Branding customization options
- **Dedicated Account Management:** Assigned support contacts
- **Custom Reporting:** Advanced reporting capabilities
- **Integration Consulting:** Technical integration support

### Limitations
- **No Public Pricing:** Enterprise pricing requires direct contact
- **Limited Customization:** Portfolio customization options limited compared to some competitors
- **No Manual Trading:** No direct trading capabilities (automated only)
- **Limited Asset Classes:** Focus on ETF portfolios (no direct stocks, bonds, alternatives)
- **Account Minimums:** $24,000 minimum for Digital tier (consumer side); no minimum for advisors
- **Fee Structure Complexity:** Tiered wrap fee structure can be complex to understand

## Add-On Products & Services

### Betterment 401(k) for Advisors
**Retirement plan administration services for advisor clients**

- **What it does:** Provides 401(k) plan administration with investment advice
- **Key Features:**
  - Paperless plan design and setup
  - Employee enrollment and management
  - Compliance testing and reporting
  - Tax-smart contribution options
- **Pricing:** Contact for pricing (varies by plan size)
- **Availability:** Available to advisor clients

### Betterment Cash Reserve
**High-yield cash management within the platform**

- **What it does:** Provides competitive cash management within advisor platform
- **Key Features:**
  - 3.25% APY (variable rate)
  - FDIC insurance up to $250K per depositor per bank
  - Potential aggregate limit of $2M ($4M for joint accounts)
  - Automated cash management
- **Pricing:** Included with platform
- **Availability:** Available to all clients

### Tax-Smart Transitions
**Helps maximize client returns through tax optimization**

- **What it does:** Provides tax-efficient transition strategies
- **Key Features:**
  - Tax-loss harvesting optimization
  - Transition analysis and planning
  - Tax impact assessment
- **Pricing:** Included with platform
- **Availability:** Available to all clients

### Dedicated Support Team
**Ongoing support from business specialists**

- **What it does:** Provides ongoing support and consulting
- **Key Features:**
  - Business growth consultation
  - Technology integration support
  - Compliance guidance
  - Marketing resources
- **Pricing:** Included with platform
- **Availability:** Available to all advisors

### RIA Tech Suite
**Comprehensive technology platform for RIAs**

- **What it does:** Complete technology stack for RIA operations
- **Key Features:**
  - Portfolio management
  - Client management
  - Billing and reporting
  - Compliance tools
- **Pricing:** Included with platform
- **Availability:** Available to all advisors

## Integrations

### Integration Overview
- **Total Integrations:** 6+ documented integrations
- **Integration Hub:** Betterment Advisor Solutions provides integration capabilities via API partnerships
- **Primary Categories:**
  - CRM Systems
  - Financial Planning Tools
  - Custodial Partners
  - Data Aggregation
  - Communication Tools

### Key Integrations (Detailed)

#### Wealthbox (CRM)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Syncs account balance, performance data, and client information between Betterment and Wealthbox
- **Data synced:** Account balances, performance data, client contact records, transaction history
- **Setup complexity:** Easy
- **Limitations:** Requires Betterment and Wealthbox accounts
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

#### Orion (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Provides integration for performance reporting and client management
- **Data synced:** Account data, performance metrics, client information
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
- **Limitations:** May require Orion account setup
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

#### Docupace (Document Management)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** One-way (to Docupace)
- **What it does:** Document management and workflow automation
- **Data synced:** Client documents, account paperwork, compliance documentation
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
- **Limitations:** Requires Docupace subscription
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

#### Capitect (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Portfolio management and rebalancing integration
- **Data synced:** Account data, portfolio allocations, rebalancing data
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
- **Limitations:** Requires Capitect account
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

#### eMoney Advisor (Financial Planning)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Financial planning and client data synchronization
- **Data synced:** Account balances, financial plan data, client goals
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
- **Limitations:** Requires eMoney account
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

#### Addepar (Portfolio Management)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Portfolio management and performance reporting
- **Data synced:** Account data, performance metrics, client information
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
- **Limitations:** Requires Addepar account
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

#### Redtail CRM (CRM)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Syncs contact records and account data
- **Data synced:** Client contacts, account balances, transaction data
- **Setup complexity:** Easy
- **Limitations:** Requires Redtail CRM account
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

#### Salesforce (CRM)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Two-way sync for portfolio data and client management
- **Data synced:** Portfolio data, account balances, client information
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
- **Limitations:** Requires Salesforce account
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

#### RightCapital (Financial Planning)
- **Type:** Native Integration
- **Direction:** Bi-directional
- **What it does:** Financial planning and retirement income planning
- **Data synced:** Account data, financial plan information, retirement projections
- **Setup complexity:** Medium
- **Limitations:** Requires RightCapital account
- **Documentation:** Available via Betterment integration documentation

### Integration Types Available
- **Native Integrations:** Direct partnerships with major financial software providers
- **API Integrations:** Available via partnership agreement (not publicly documented)
- **Third-Party Platforms:** Supported through Zapier and similar platforms
- **Webhooks:** Not publicly documented

### Integration Categories

**Categories with descriptions:**
- **CRM Systems:** Client relationship management platforms
- **Financial Planning:** Retirement planning and financial goal software
- **Portfolio Management:** Portfolio management and performance reporting
- **Document Management:** Document storage and workflow automation
- **Data Aggregation:** Account aggregation and data sync services

**Note:** Integration documentation available only to registered advisors via advisor dashboard

## Evaluation Notes

### Pros
1. **No minimum AUM requirements** for advisor accounts
2. **No upfront costs** to set up advisor platform
3. **Tax-loss harvesting** included at no extra cost
4. **Direct indexing** available for tax optimization
5. **Cash Reserve integration** (3.25% APY)
6. **Paperless account opening** with agreement automation
7. **Flexible billing options** (AUM-based, flat fee, tiered structure)
8. **Comprehensive dashboard** for advisor management
9. **Good integration ecosystem** with major financial software
10. **Brand customization** available (logo, email templates)

### Cons
1. **No public pricing** for enterprise tier
2. **Limited portfolio customization** (ETF-only portfolios)
3. **No manual trading** capabilities
4. **Limited asset classes** (no alternatives, individual stocks/bonds)
5. **API documentation** not publicly available
6. **Requires advisor registration** for full access
7. **Fee structure complexity** with tiered wrap fees
8. **No white-label** for consumer-facing branding
9. **Limited to US-based** advisors and clients
10. **Requires Betterment account** for all integrations

### Alternatives
- **Orion:** More customizable portfolio management but higher cost
- **Black Diamond:** Traditional custodial platform with more asset class options
- **Envestnet:** Larger platform with more integration options
- **Wealthbox + Altruist:** Alternative combination for smaller RIAs
- **Addepar:** More advanced reporting and customization for large firms

### Use Cases

#### Ideal For:
- **Independent RIAs** seeking tech-enabled custodian
- **Advisors wanting automation** for portfolio management and billing
- **Firms focusing on tax optimization** for clients
- **Advisors with tech-savvy clients** who appreciate digital experience
- **Small to mid-sized RIAs** (under $100M AUM)
- **Advisors wanting simple pricing** structure
- **Firms looking for** **all-in-one platform** (portfolio management + billing + client portal)

#### Not Ideal For:
- **Advisors requiring manual trading** capabilities
- **Firms needing alternative investments** (real estate, private equity, etc.)
- **Advisors wanting white-label** consumer branding
- **Large RIAs with complex reporting needs**
- **Advisors requiring** **direct stock/bond portfolios**
- **Firms needing** **international clients**
- **Advisors wanting** **full API documentation** without registration

### Key Differentiators
1. **Tech-Enabled Custodian:** Combines portfolio management, billing, and custody
2. **Tax-Optimized Investing:** Advanced tax-loss harvesting and direct indexing
3. **No Minimums:** No AUM minimums for advisor accounts
4. **Flexible Billing:** Multiple billing options (AUM, flat fee, tiered)
5. **Paperless Onboarding:** Agreement automation and digital account opening
